bullet: Highly efficient vim user with extensive custom configuration to improve my workflow on any machine
Use vim, neovim, and vim emulators daily, including for browsing
name: Vim
desc: Vim is one of my favorite tools in my kit. I use it every single day and honestly feel a little lost without it. I use emulators for it in VSCode, Chromium/Firefox, and anywhere I can. My configurations have been a work-in-progress for around two years and can be ported to any machine I'm using through a git repo.
